main

Class TuneSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.TuneSearch

  • public class TuneSearch
extends java.lang.Object
    Makes a call to the API at thesession.org to get a list of tunes matching a given set of search terms. The number of results-per-page in the response can be specified, up to a maximum of 50. An ArrayList of TunesSearchResults is returned in response to the executeSearch methods.
    Since:
    2017-01-26
    Author:
    Colman O'B

      • TuneSearch

        public TuneSearch()

    • Method Detail

      • executeSearch

        public java.util.ArrayList<TunesSearchResult> executeSearch(java.lang.String searchTerms,
                                                            int resultsPerPage)
                                                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Launches a search for tunes matching a given set of search terms and returns the results as an ArrayList of TunesSearchReult objects
        Parameters:
        searchTerms - Search terms are matched against tune titles in thesession.org database
        resultsPerPage - It is possible to specify up to 50 tune results per page in the API response
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of TunesSearchResult objects
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The API at thesession.org can return a maximum of 50 results per page

      • executeSearch

        public java.util.ArrayList<TunesSearchResult> executeSearch(java.lang.String searchTerms,
                                                            int resultsPerPage,
                                                            int pageNumber)
                                                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Launches a search for tunes matching a given set of search terms and returns the results as an ArrayList of TunesSearchReult objects
        Parameters:
        searchTerms - Search terms are matched against tune titles in thesession.org database
        resultsPerPage - It is possible to specify up to 50 tune results per page in the API response
        pageNumber - Specifies an individual page number within the current set of results
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of TunesSearchResult objects
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The API at thesession.org can return a maximum of 50 results per page

      • getPageCount

        public int getPageCount()
                 throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Retrieves the number of pages of results returned from the API. This can be useful for looping through multiple pages of results.
        Returns:
        The number of pages of results in the response
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown if the pageCount variable has not been set
